Headline: Temporary Westbound #63 63rd Reroute near 63rd/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 63rd/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
